select-class-comments.name: select-class-comments
select-class-comments.using:
"class_comments"."is_deleted" = false
          AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM classes c
            WHERE c.id = "class_comments"."class_id"
            AND c.is_deleted = false
            AND (
              c.is_published = true
              OR (
                (select auth.uid()) IS NOT NULL
                AND EXISTS (
                  SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
                  WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
                  AND p.role = 'admin'
                )
              )
            )
          )

insert-class-comments.name: insert-class-comments
insert-class-comments.withCheck:
"class_comments"."user_id" = (select auth.uid())
          AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM classes c
            WHERE c.id = "class_comments"."class_id"
            AND c.is_deleted = false
            AND c.is_published = true
          )

select-class-tags.name: select-class-tags
select-class-tags.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM classes c
          WHERE c.id = "class_tags"."class_id"
          AND c.is_deleted = false
          AND (
            c.is_published = true
            OR EXISTS (
              SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
              WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
              AND p.role = 'admin'
            )
          )
        )

insert-class-tags-admin.name: insert-class-tags-admin
insert-class-tags-admin.withCheck:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

delete-class-tags-admin.name: delete-class-tags-admin
delete-class-tags-admin.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

select-class.name: select-class
select-class.using:
"classes"."is_deleted" = false
    AND (
      "classes"."is_published" = true
      OR (
        (select auth.uid()) IS NOT NULL
        AND EXISTS (
          SELECT 1
          FROM profiles p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )
      )
    )

admin-insert-class.name: admin-insert-class
admin-insert-class.withCheck:
EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
      FROM profiles p
      WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
      AND p.role = 'admin'
    )

admin-update-class.name: admin-update-class
admin-update-class.using:
EXISTS (

EXISTS (

EXISTS (

          SELECT 1 FROM profiles p

update-tags-admin-only.withCheck:
EXISTS (

select-gallery.name: select-gallery
select-gallery.using:
"galleries"."is_published" = true
          AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM profiles p
            WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
            AND (p.gallery_access = true OR p.role = 'admin')
          )

select-gallery-tags.name: select-gallery-tags
select-gallery-tags.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM galleries g
            WHERE g.id = "gallery_tags"."gallery_id"
            AND g.is_published = true
          )

select-gallery-view-events-admin-only.name: select-gallery-view-events-admin-only
select-gallery-view-events-admin-only.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

select-news.name: select-news
select-news.using:
"news"."is_published" = true
        AND (
          "news"."visibility" = 'public'
          OR (
            "news"."visibility" = 'member'
            AND (select auth.uid()) IS NOT NULL
          )
        )

select-news-view-events-admin-only.name: select-news-view-events-admin-only
select-news-view-events-admin-only.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM profiles p
            WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
            AND p.role = 'admin'
          )

user-update-own-profile.name: user-update-own-profile
user-update-own-profile.using:
(select auth.uid()) = "profiles"."profile_id"
        AND NOT EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM $1 p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

admin-update-all-profiles.name: admin-update-all-profiles
admin-update-all-profiles.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM $1 p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )
admin-update-all-profiles.withCheck:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM $1 p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

select-profile.name: select-profile
select-profile.using:
(select auth.uid()) = "profiles"."profile_id"
        OR EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM $1 p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )

delete-profile.name: delete-profile
delete-profile.using:
(select auth.uid()) = "profiles"."profile_id"
        OR EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM $1 p
          WHERE p.profile_id = (select auth.uid())
          AND p.role = 'admin'
        )
